messages.subject: MTV Commercial
messages.msgSnippet: Has anyone seen this MTV commercial? Animated.  Mom and son sitting on couch watching TV.  All you can  hear is the sountrack of the movie, and there s dialog
messages.messageBody:
Has anyone seen this MTV commercial?

Animated. Mom and son sitting on couch watching TV. All you can hear is
the sountrack of the movie, and there's dialog between a man and a woman and
then a bad guy comes in. Then you hear all this violence and hitting and a gun
firing. When that's all over, the woman on TV says something like, "My
hero...give me a kiss" then there's sound of kissing, etc. At this point the mom
on the couch reaches over with her hand and covers the boy's eyes.

Then the line, "Watch and Learn" appears and it's over.

I thought it was cool.

Karen


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
